resources.string:
Bubblig is an unofficial news reader app for Bubb.la, a Swedish news collection site.
Bubblig uses the Bubb.la RSS-feed in combination with Readability in order to read the articles.
Created by Johan Fredriksson and Robin Gustafsson.\nBubblig is not affiliated with Bubb.la.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent feugiat porttitor ultricies. Mauris volutpat massa sit amet aliquam pharetra.

Failed to fetch content for article.

You may visit the original source by pressing the icon on the action bar.
